name: Polar Bear In A Snowstorm (fishynator)
description:
POLAR BEAR IN A SNOWSTORM

Are you able to find the polar bear who's lost in the storm?
Use the mouse to create an opening in the blizzard
Find the hidden bear in all levels to unlock endless mode

Created for Cartridge Jam 3
The chosen cartridge that inspired this game was created by Bo Johansson Möller.

 

Assets
  • Storm and bear sounds
    • http://www.freesfx.co.uk
  • Snow step sounds
    • 42 Snow and Gravel Footsteps by Corsica_S
